title.narrative: Team Europe Initiativ: Climate Change, Conflict and Migration in Sahel

description.narrative:
The objective of the assignment is to assist the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (MFA) prepare a full proposal for a Team Europe Initiative (TEI) on Climate Change, Conflict and Migration in Sahel.
The assignment is part of programme preparation of a new initiative with a total budget of DKK 800 million. The assignment will build on the following documentation prepared for the new programme: A mapping report from March 2020, an identification report (March 2021), a concept note (April 2021), and a pre-appraisal report (expected July 2021) and a programme document (expected September 2021). The consultant will assist the MFA in preparing and participating in consultations with potential partners and finalise the required documentation, including ensuring ownership of partners in an iterative formulation process. Based on the consultations, the consultant will prepare the actual documentation needed to finalise the formulation of the new TEI, which will make it ready for implementation, including documentation for a possible delegated partnership with the EU Commission.
